EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail HTML sent when a case is logged online (Spanish)
EmailTemplate.name: EUR_Case confirmation - online HTML (Spanish)
EmailTemplate.subject: IATA {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Estimado cliente,
Gracias por remitirnos su consulta en línea. Un agente de Atención al Cliente le responderá en breve. El número de referencia de su consulta es {!Case.CaseNumber}. Le rogamos haga referencia al mismo si necesita contactar con Atención al Cliente para cualquier aclaración adicional.
Asunto: {!Case.Subject} Descripción: {!Case.Description}
Un cordial saludo, IATA Service Centre Europe www.iata.org/customer
Dear Customer,
Thank you for submitting your question to us online. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created and a local Customer Support Representative will get back to you shortly. Please use the above Case Number if you need to contact your local Customer Service in regards to this case.
Best regards,
IATA Service Centre Europe www.iata.org/customer
{!Case.Thread_Id}
